wikipedia_page.main: Brian Savegar (24 August 1932 – 31 March 2007) was a production designer in the film and TV industry. He won an Academy Award in 1986 in the category Best Art Direction for the film A Room with a View.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Production Design
